info.title: Platformatic DB
info.description: Exposing a SQL database as REST

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit will be applied by default if not passed. If the provided value exceeds the maximum allowed value a validation error will be thrown

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Include cursor headers in response. Cursor keys built from orderBy clause

parameters.name: startAfter
parameters.description: Cursor for forward pagination. List objects after this cursor position

parameters.name: endBefore
parameters.description: Cursor for backward pagination. List objects before this cursor position

post.description: Add new applicationScaleConfig to the database.

put.description: Update one or more applicationScaleConfigs in the database.

get.description: Fetch ApplicationScaleConfig using its id from the database.

delete.description: Delete one or more applicationScaleConfigs from the Database.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit will be applied by default if not passed. If the provided value exceeds the maximum allowed value a validation error will be thrown

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Include cursor headers in response. Cursor keys built from orderBy clause

parameters.name: startAfter
parameters.description: Cursor for forward pagination. List objects after this cursor position

parameters.name: endBefore
parameters.description: Cursor for backward pagination. List objects before this cursor position

put.description: Update one or more controllers in the database.

get.description: Fetch Controller using its id from the database.

delete.description: Delete one or more controllers from the Database.
